<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a093b0a333833131b3fb12fb62f915bf1">computeActionsTable</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const LandingPadInfo &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LandingPads,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ActionEntry&gt;</a> &amp;Actions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;FirstActions);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a1f1ea57bc156f9e309b4049bc1d10e17">computePadMap</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const LandingPadInfo &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LandingPads,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a8263fed2d1a8589d4124ec53fdc8f26b">RangeMapType</a> &amp;PadMap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the call-site table and the call-site ranges. The entry for an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// invoke has a try-range containing the call, a non-zero landing pad and an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// appropriate action. The entry for an ordinary call has a try-range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// containing the call and zero for the landing pad and the action.  Calls</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// marked &#39;nounwind&#39; have no entry and must not be contained in the try-range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of any entry - they form gaps in the table.  Entries must be ordered by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// try-range address. CallSiteRanges vector is only populated for Itanium</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// exception handling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a49694eb08442bb35020b9d8dfad6d7e5">computeCallSiteTable</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;CallSiteEntry&gt;</a> &amp;CallSites,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;CallSiteRange&gt;</a> &amp;CallSiteRanges,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const LandingPadInfo &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LandingPads,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;FirstActions);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Emit landing pads and actions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The general organization of the table is complex, but the basic concepts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// are easy.  First there is a header which describes the location and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// organization of the three components that follow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  1 The landing pad site information describes the range of code covered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     by the try.  In our case it&#39;s an accumulation of the ranges covered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     by the invokes in the try.  There is also a reference to the landing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     pad that handles the exception once processed.  Finally an index into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     the actions table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  2 The action table, in our case, is composed of pairs of type ids</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     and next action offset.  Starting with the action index from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     landing pad site, each type Id is checked for a match to the current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     exception.  If it matches then the exception and type id are passed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     on to the landing pad.  Otherwise the next action is looked up.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     chain is terminated with a next action of zero.  If no type id is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     found the frame is unwound and handling continues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  3 Type id table contains references to all the C++ typeinfo for all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     catches in the function.  This tables is reversed indexed base 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the starting symbol of an exception table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a420cc4a7a63b33a52659768b133b5f1b">emitExceptionTable</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a0693fd10cd699cd25acfe38350e47577">emitTypeInfos</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TTypeEncoding, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;TTBaseLabel);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helpers for identifying what kind of clause an EH typeid or selector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// corresponds to. Negative selectors are for filter clauses, the zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// selector is for cleanups, and positive selectors are for catch clauses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a53e615f9a2ef0dec49685674e388c6d2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a53e615f9a2ef0dec49685674e388c6d2">isFilterEHSelector</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Selector) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Selector &lt; 0; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a588e43cc9f4e6e19f0b10e9e65518f01"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a588e43cc9f4e6e19f0b10e9e65518f01">isCleanupEHSelector</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Selector) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Selector == 0; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a6de56377798490410db5d499f851ffcc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a6de56377798490410db5d499f851ffcc">isCatchEHSelector</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Selector) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Selector &gt; 0; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
